segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, reaching up for a cookie like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on the boy and the jar, she doesn’t even see the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is or if she just doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and she’s just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s not helping the boy or at least trying to steady the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and the girl doesn’t even glance her way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in trouble if the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so tense, and I’m just waiting for something to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies, but I also hope they don’t get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a risky game, and I’m not sure how it’s going to end.
segments.speaker: PAR
